employee_external_id.notes: HiBob uses employee ID in path parameter. Map path parameter 'id' to Flip's employee_external_id field for absence creation.

absence_type_external_id.notes: HiBob uses 'policyType' field to specify the type of time off policy. Map to Flip's absence_type_external_id field.

status.notes: ✅ CONFIRMED: HiBob has 'status' field in responses (lines 76, 124, 227). Map HiBob status values to Flip's status enum (REQUESTED/APPROVED). Requires enum value mapping.

start_date.notes: Direct mapping of date fields. HiBob uses 'startDate' field in request body. Both APIs use date format.

end_date.notes: Direct mapping of date fields. HiBob uses 'endDate' field in request body. Both APIs use date format.

start_half_day.notes: HiBob uses 'startDatePortion' enum (all_day, morning, afternoon). Map 'morning' to true, 'all_day' to false. Requires logical conversion.

end_half_day.notes: HiBob uses 'endDatePortion' enum (all_day, morning, afternoon). Map 'afternoon' to true, 'all_day' to false. Requires logical conversion.

amount.notes: HiBob has separate 'days' and 'hours' fields. Map 'days' to Flip's 'amount' field when unit is DAYS. May need to convert hours to days.

unit.notes: HiBob has separate 'days' and 'hours' fields. Determine unit based on which field is populated. Map to Flip's unit enum (DAYS/HOURS).

employee_note.notes: ✅ CONFIRMED: HiBob has 'description' field in request body (lines 62, 130, 230). Direct mapping of description field to Flip's employee_note field.

processing_context: HiBob Time Off API to Flip HRIS Absence Management API mapping. HiBob uses employee-specific endpoints with path parameters, while Flip uses a unified absence creation endpoint.
key_differences: HiBob uses employee ID in path parameter vs Flip's employee_external_id in request body
HiBob has separate days/hours fields vs Flip's amount/unit structure
HiBob uses startDatePortion/endDatePortion enums vs Flip's boolean half_day fields
implementation_notes: Employee ID must be extracted from HiBob path parameter and mapped to request body
Policy type mapping may require lookup table for external IDs
Status values need enum mapping between HiBob and Flip systems
Date portion fields require logical conversion to boolean half_day indicators
Days/hours fields need to be combined into amount/unit structure
All date fields use same format and can be mapped directly
